ProcessSpecification.name: PIP5D1RequestShipFromStockAndDebitAuthorization
ProcessSpecification.Documentation: This PIP enables (1) a distributor to request authorization to sell stock at a new buy price and claim reimbursement for the difference between the original price and the new price, and (2) a supplier to respond to the request.

BusinessDocument.name: Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request
BusinessDocument.Documentation: References an existing quote and specific line items. This is the only information needed to make the authorization request, as customer or project details are expected to be documented in the actual quote.

BusinessDocument.name: Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation
BusinessDocument.Documentation: Returns an authorization status and details from applicable line items per the quote number provided in the authorization request.

Package.name: Request Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization

BusinessTransaction.name: Request Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization

RequestingBusinessActivity.name: Initiate Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request

DocumentEnvelope.name: Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request
DocumentEnvelope.businessDocument: //BusinessDocument[@name="Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Request"]

RespondingBusinessActivity.name: Initiate Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation

DocumentEnvelope.name: Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation
DocumentEnvelope.businessDocument: //BusinessDocument[@name="Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Confirmation"]

BinaryCollaboration.name: Request Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization
BinaryCollaboration.Documentation: The PIP Start State is comprised of the following conditions: a. TPA Approved and Exist In Backend System b. Sending Partner Exist as Party and Valid c. Receiving Partner Exist as Party d. Business Document Exist In Backend System, Valid, Non-Repudiated and Authorized

The PIP End States are comprised of the following conditions: a. Acknowledgment of Receipt Exist In Backend System, Valid and Non-Repudiated b. Receiving Partner Authorized ; PIP Failure State: a. NOT Successful b. Retry Count Exceeded

Start.toBusinessState: ../BusinessTransactionActivity[@name="Request Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization"]

BusinessTransactionActivity.name: Request Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization
BusinessTransactionActivity.businessTransaction: //BusinessTransaction[@name="Request Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization"]

Failure.fromBusinessState: ../BusinessTransactionActivity[@name="Request Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization"]
